body:
godep commands are failing on mac (head of master).

I'm pretty sure godep is doing a `go get` which tries to build the code, instead of just checking it out. So it's failing trying to build `github.com/google/cadvisor/api` and `golang.org/x/exp/inotify`.

Go installed with homebrew. 
`GOPATH=/Users/karl/workspace/k8s-master`

```
$ godep restore
package github.com/google/cadvisor/api
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify: cannot find package "golang.org/x/exp/inotify" in any of:
    /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOROOT)
    /Users/karl/workspace/k8s-master/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOPATH)
godep: restore: exit status 1
package golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify: cannot find package "golang.org/x/exp/inotify" in any of:
    /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOROOT)
    /Users/karl/workspace/k8s-master/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOPATH)
godep: restore: exit status 1
package golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify: cannot find package "golang.org/x/exp/inotify" in any of:
    /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOROOT)
    /Users/karl/workspace/k8s-master/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOPATH)
godep: restore: exit status 1
package golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify: cannot find package "golang.org/x/exp/inotify" in any of:
    /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOROOT)
    /Users/karl/workspace/k8s-master/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOPATH)
godep: restore: exit status 1
package golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify: cannot find package "golang.org/x/exp/inotify" in any of:
    /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOROOT)
    /Users/karl/workspace/k8s-master/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOPATH)
godep: restore: exit status 1
package golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify
    imports golang.org/x/exp/inotify: cannot find package "golang.org/x/exp/inotify" in any of:
    /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOROOT)
    /Users/karl/workspace/k8s-master/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOPATH)
godep: restore: exit status 1
```

```
$ godep update github.com/onsi/ginkgo
godep: C source files not allowed when not using cgo: statvfs.c
godep: cannot find package "golang.org/x/exp/inotify" in any of:
    /usr/local/Cellar/go/1.4.2/libexec/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOROOT)
    /Users/karl/workspace/k8s-master/src/golang.org/x/exp/inotify (from $GOPATH)
godep: error loading dependencies
```
title: godep restore/update failing on mac
